meanings.definition: The trunk of the human body.
meanings.sent1: She admired the strong torsos of the athletes at the competition.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the patient's torsos during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The torsos of the mannequins in the store seemed to be striking poses.
meanings.sent4: In the painting, the artist captured the torsos of the dancers in fluid motion.
meanings.sent5: The torsos of the statues in the museum were incredibly detailed and lifelike.

meanings.definition: The main part of a statue or other figure.
meanings.sent1: The sculptor focused on perfecting the torsos of the marble statues.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed various torsos of historical figures.
meanings.sent3: The torsos of the statues in the park seemed to be gossiping with each other.
meanings.sent4: The torsos of the sculptures stood out against the backdrop of the art gallery.
